ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Transport of A. MICHEL LAVIGNE of Laval, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
